title: How can Service be a good example in Moral philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I understand it you are referring to Service, as in the hospitality industry. There can be no greater principle in life than serving others with grace and favour. However, this is not an easy task I believe as others expectations can be very high, some people can be rather demanding, impolite and rude, and to balance good ethics and exemplary behaviour when offering service to others, when others are being less than fair and empathetic to your position, can be a very big ask. To stay focused, maintain composure and self-control, poise and presence of mind in carrying out one’s service whatever the significant eventuality is the best example I know of moral behaviour. This is very subjective in itself, but can be generally represented by an individuals capacity to perform good work in every event.
